settings.text: Get paid when you refer clients to Trak Racer

settings.content: Promote the world's leading Simulation Hardware Company and find a new income stream today!
As an affiliate partner, you have the opportunity to earn commission on any sales generated using your affiliate links, in addition to access to exclusive content and promotions.

settings.content: Sign Up for Free

settings.title: Step 2
settings.content: Share your link

settings.title: Step 3
settings.content: Earn when your link is used

settings.title: Earn 5% on nearly everything!

settings.title: Earn 5% on nearly everything!
settings.content:
Earn a 5% commission on almost any product, excluding PCs & monitors. With a 5% commission on brands like Simucube, you could earn $100s on a single sale!

*RRP prices and subsequently earnings are subject to change without notice.

✔️ Share With Your Inner Circle

Tell friends and family how Trak Racer produce the most innovative and best quality hardware that helped improve your performance on the Trak or in the Sky.

✔️ Write a Blog Post

Do you write about sim racing, flight sim, technology or motorsports? Describe your experience with Trak Racer on your blog. Product comparison articles work wonders for other affiliates!

✔️ Spread the Word on Social

Share your favorite products and let your followers know about your love for Trak Racer and don’t forget to use your tracking URL!

✔️ Publish Educational Content

Get creative. Give people a tour of your Trak Racer setup and provide guidance on what they need to get started in Sim Racing or Flight Sim.

🔻Run Digital Campaigns

Promote Trak Racer on your website through banner ads and other content using your affiliate link.

🔻 Get Your Clients Onboard

Are you a simulation coach or professional cockpit builder? Recommend Trak Racer to your clients to earn more on top of your services.

There's so many different ways to earn! Utilise your existing channels to reach more clients and the endless potential!

Affiliate Program Terms and Conditions

The following terms and conditions (the "Agreement") govern your participation in the Trak Racer Partner Program (the "Program") offered by Trak Racer. By joining the Program, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to comply with these terms and conditions. Trak Racer reserves the right to modify or update these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly for any changes.

  1. Eligibility:

a) The Program is open to individuals aged 18 years or older.
b) Affiliates must have a PayPal account to receive payouts.
c) Affiliates must agree to the terms and conditions of the Program.

  1. Affiliate Responsibilities:
    2.1 As an affiliate, you will promote Trak Racer products using the provided affiliate link and marketing materials.
    2.2 You must not engage in any deceptive, misleading, or unethical marketing practices.
    2.3 You must not use any variation of the Trak Racer trademark or any Trak Racer URL as your display URL.
    2.4 Affiliates are prohibited from bidding on specific keywords or terms related to Trak Racer products, as outlined in the Paid Search Policy.
    2.5 You may not receive credit for referring yourself or engage in any fraudulent activities.
    2.6 You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations while promoting Trak Racer products.
  2. Commission and Payouts:
    3.1 Affiliates will earn a commission of up to 5% on the referral sale of Trak Racer products.
    3.2 Commissions will only be paid for completed sales that meet the following criteria:
    a) The referred sale must have completed the 60-day payout period.
    b) The total affiliate commission must exceed the minimum payment amount of $150 USD.
    3.3 Payouts will be made monthly, and the payout report will be generated on the 15th of every month.
    3.4 After the payout report is generated, it may take 1 to 2 weeks for funds to be disbursed.
    3.5 Affiliates will be paid through PayPal. It is the affiliate's responsibility to ensure their PayPal information is accurate and up to date.
  3. Prohibited Activities:
    4.1 Affiliates are strictly prohibited from engaging in self-referrals.
    4.2 Affiliates may not use language or ad copy that suggests official representation of Trak Racer.
    4.3 Affiliates may not register or use any domain name URL that includes the word "Trak Racer" in any form.
    4.4 Affiliates may not earn commissions during sale or promotional periods until the sale or promotion has ended.
    4.5 Reseller sales are excluded from the Program.
    4.6 Trak Racer reserves the right to change the Program policy without notice at any time.
    4.7 Affiliates found violating or attempting to circumvent these rules will have all affiliate credit voided, will not receive payouts, and may be banned from further participation in the Program.
  4. Intellectual Property:
    5.1 Trak Racer retains all rights, title, and interest in its trademarks, logos, and intellectual property.
    5.2 Affiliates may use Trak Racer marketing materials provided by the Program for promotional purposes only.
    5.3 Affiliates may not modify or alter any Trak Racer marketing materials without prior written consent.
  5. Limitation of Liability:
    6.1 Trak Racer shall not be liable for any indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of or related to the Program.
    6.2 Trak Racer's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the total commissions paid or payable to the affiliate under the Program.
  6. Termination:
    7.1 Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time and for any reason by providing written notice to the other party.
    7.2 Upon termination, all rights and licenses granted to the affiliate under this Agreement will immediately cease.
    7.3 Termination does not relieve the affiliate from any liability incurred prior to termination.
  7. Governing Law and Jurisdiction:
    8.1 This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Trak Racer is registered.
    8.2 Any disputes arising from or related to this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction.

By joining the Trak Racer Partner Program, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of this Agreement, you should not participate in the Program.

If you have any questions or need further information, please contact us through the provided channels.

settings.title: How does the program work?
settings.content: The Trak Racer Partner Program allows you to make money by referring customers to the Trak Racer website. For every customer you refer that makes a purchase, you will earn a 5% commission. We will handle the fulfillment and customer service. You can use the dashboard to see detailed information about orders you have generated. When your commission 'bank' reaches $200 we will pay your commission at the start of the next month.

settings.title: What products can I promote?
settings.content: You can promote any and all products on the Trak Racer site! We offer a 5% commission on all products from any brand, except for PCs and Monitors!

settings.title: Does it cost anything to sign up?
settings.content: No! It is completely free to sign up and promote our products.

settings.title: Can anyone join your affiliate program?
settings.content: Yes, our program is free to join and open to bloggers, sim racers, streamers, YouTubers, online marketers, digital entrepreneurs, and more. You don’t need to be an existing Trak Racer customer to become an affiliate, but we’d love for you to try our product. As an affiliate, you may benefit from special offers and discounts from time to time. Please note that rseller sales are excluded from the program.

settings.title: Can I earn a commission on my own purchases?
settings.content: Self-referrals for affiliate purchases are strictly prohibited. You will not receive credit when purchasing a product or service through your own affiliate link. You may receive an automatic notification from Trak Racer Subscriptions to let you know that a sale has taken place, but your affiliate payments will not include this amount.

settings.title: How do you track my sales?
settings.content: After signing up, you’ll get a unique and shareable affiliate link to use immediately. We use cookie tracking and your affiliate link to record clicks, new accounts, sales, and performance data.

settings.title: How much can I earn?
settings.content: There are no limits on how much you can make. The more referrals that convert through your affiliate link, the more you’ll earn.

settings.title: When will I be paid?
settings.content: For the recurring program, we pay commissions around the start of each month for verified sales from the previous month.

settings.title: Should I disclose use of affiliate links in my content?
settings.content: Yes, and we recommend you do. Please visit the United States Federal Trade Commission’s website for guidelines concerning affiliate and influencer marketing disclosures and best practices.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content: For the detailed terms and conditions of the affiliate program, please click here.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 8am-8:30pm.
